Package cards.action_cards.pay_bank

Class WinACompetition

java.lang.Object
cards.Card
cards.ActionCard
cards.action_cards.PayTheBank
cards.action_cards.pay_bank.WinACompetition
All Implemented Interfaces:
MachineRandom
public class WinACompetition
extends PayTheBank
Class implementing a Win a Competition action card, which asks the player to pay money to the Bank, equivalent to the competition tax.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    WinACompetition()
    Creates a Win a Competition action card object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

  • Constructor Details

    • WinACompetition

      public WinACompetition()
      Creates a Win a Competition action card object

      In particular, a Win a Competition action card object is initialized as follows:

      • Its name is "Win a Competition".
      • The lower bound for the possible competition tax is $1000.
      • The upper bound for the possible competition tax is $5000.
      • The increment for the possible competition tax is $1000.

      The bounds and increments were decided upon by the programmers. The initialization of the competition tax is taken care of in the parent constructor.

  • Method Details

    • getInfo

      public java.lang.String getInfo()
      Returns the card description to be displayed as a prompt during the actual gameplay

      In particular, the card description reads as follows: "You have won a competition. Pay [competition tax] as competition tax."

      Specified by:
      getInfo in class ActionCard
      Returns:
      card description to be displayed as a prompt during the actual gameplay
